about_the_game:
In Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster, you play as Conner, a high school student who gains the extraordinary power to pull unlimited pencils out of his pockets. But this power is not just for show - Your mission is to use your skills and wit to take down The Spankster, a fellow student who has acquired the power to spank others without any repercussions. But beware, as the real harm comes from the public humiliation that the victim is subjected to.

As you navigate the halls of the high school, you'll encounter a cast of colorful characters and make choices that determine the course of the story. Will you be able to stop The Spankster and restore peace to the school? It's up to you to decide.

With four different endings to discover, each based on the choices you make, Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster offers a truly interactive experience. Will you be a hero, a rebel, or something in between? The fate of the school is in your hands.

name: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of The Spankster

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Pencil Plus: The Wrath of the Spankster is an interactive novel style choose your own adventure game in which players take the role of Conner, a normal high school kid that gains a very unique super power: the ability to pull limitless pencils out of his pockets.
